QuestData.Title: Memories of the Dead
QuestData.Description: The runes on this ring you found are still legible: it was given to "Kalytha" when she was granted admission to the Academy. With the right spell or two, this personal trinket of hers is the gateway to her soul.$B$BTake the ring back to Lake Mennar. Kalytha's spirit should now be visible to you on the shore of the lake. Touch her and the ring will allow you to see the world as she sees it, forever reliving her final hours. Probe her mind, $n! Speak to the others and learn the secrets of Lake Mennar...
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Kalytha's Ring to the shores of Lake Mennar. Touch the Spirit of Kalytha to relive her memories. Speak to the other spirits until you've learned the secret of Lake Mennar.
QuestData.CompletionText: You shudder, the memories of another life threatening to overpower you...
QuestData.RewardText: You reel as the spirit's vision fades, relieved to once again feel the earth beneath your feet and the comforting rhythm of your own quickened heart.
